issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.

projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: The problem described is an issue which will never be fixed.

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

fields.summary: Windows: TableViewRow title should not show if the row has a child element
fields.environment:
Ti SDK: 6.1.1.v20170619143158, 6.1.0.GA
Appc Core: 6.2.2
Appc NPM: 4.2.9
Lumia 550 10.0
10.0 ws-local

comments.body:
This happens on iOS too. Should we clone new ticket for iOS too?

 !ios.png|thumbnail!
I would keep this behavior because this happens on iOS too. Maybe we should think this a logical bug?
Closing old "Won't fix" tickets. If you disagree, please reopen.
